item.title: [sld] Ertai, the Corrupted
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Human Wizard

{U}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature or enchantment: Counter target spell.

item.title: [sld] Glissa, the Traitor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Zombie Elf

First strike, deathtouch

Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [sld] Blighted Agent
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Human Rogue

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

Blighted Agent can't be blocked.

item.title: [sld] K'rrik, Son of Yawgmoth
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Horror Minion

({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)

Lifelink

For each {B} in a cost, you may pay 2 life rather than pay that mana.

Whenever you cast a black spell, put a +1/+1 counter on K'rrik, Son of Yawgmoth.

item.title: [sld] Glistener Elf
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Elf Warrior

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

item.title: [sld] Batterskull
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token, then attach this to it.)

Equipped creature gets +4/+4 and has vigilance and lifelink.

{3}: Return Batterskull to its owner's hand.

Equip {5}

item.title: [sld] Inkmoth Nexus
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}: Inkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Phyrexian Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying and infect until end of turn. It's still a land. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

item.title: [sld] Eldrazi Conscription
item.description:
Tribal Enchantment — Eldrazi Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +10/+10 and has trample and annihilator 2. (Whenever it attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

item.title: [sld] Deafening Silence
item.description:
Enchantment

Each player can't cast more than one noncreature spell each turn.

item.title: [sld] Counterbalance
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, counter that spell if it has the same mana value as the revealed card.

item.title: [sld] Hexdrinker
item.description:
Creature — Snake

Level up {1} ({1}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)

LEVEL 3-7

4/4

Protection from instants

LEVEL 8+

6/6

Protection from everything

item.title: [sld] Bruna, Light of Alabaster
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Angel

Flying, vigilance

Whenever Bruna, Light of Alabaster attacks or blocks, you may attach to it any number of Auras on the battlefield and you may put onto the battlefield attached to it any number of Aura cards that could enchant it from your graveyard and/or hand.

item.title: [sld] Lotus Cobra
item.description:
Creature — Snake

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, add one mana of any color.

item.title: [sld] Seshiro the Anointed
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Snake Monk

Other Snake creatures you control get +2/+2.

Whenever a Snake you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

item.title: [sld] Stonecoil Serpent
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Snake

Reach, trample, protection from multicolored

Stonecoil Serpent enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

item.title: [sld] Ice-Fang Coatl
item.description:
Snow Creature — Snake

Flash

Flying

When Ice-Fang Coatl enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Ice-Fang Coatl has deathtouch as long as you control at least three other snow permanents.

item.title: [sld] Alms Collector
item.description:
Creature — Cat Cleric

Flash

If an opponent would draw two or more cards, instead you and that player each draw a card.

item.title: [sld] Crested Sunmare
item.description:
Creature — Horse

Other Horses you control have indestructible.

At the beginning of each end step, if you gained life this turn, create a 5/5 white Horse creature token.

item.title: [sld] Rin and Seri, Inseparable
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dog Cat

Whenever you cast a Dog spell, create a 1/1 green Cat creature token.

Whenever you cast a Cat spell, create a 1/1 white Dog creature token.

{R}{G}{W}, {T}: Rin and Seri, Inseparable deals damage to any target equal to the number of Dogs you control. You gain life equal to the number of Cats you control.

item.title: [sld] Goreclaw, Terror of Qal Sisma
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Bear

Creature spells you cast with power 4 or greater cost {2} less to cast.

Whenever Goreclaw, Terror of Qal Sisma attacks, each creature you control with power 4 or greater gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Exotic Orchard
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

item.title: [sld] Sakashima the Impostor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Rogue

You may have Sakashima the Impostor enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except its name is Sakashima the Impostor, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has "{2}{U}{U}: Return this creature to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step."

item.title: [sld] Massacre Girl
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Assassin

Menace

When Massacre Girl enters the battlefield, each other creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Whenever a creature dies this turn, each creature other than Massacre Girl gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Azusa, Lost but Seeking
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Monk

You may play two additional lands on each of your turns.

item.title: [sld] Teysa Karlov
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Advisor

If a creature dying causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

Creature tokens you control have vigilance and lifelink.

item.title: [sld] Paradise Mantle
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

Equip {1}

item.title: [sld] Braid of Fire
item.description:
Enchantment

Cumulative upkeep—Add {R}. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

item.title: [sld] Koth of the Hammer
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Koth

+1: Untap target Mountain. It becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

−2: Add {R} for each Mountain you control.

−5: You get an emblem with "Mountains you control have '{T}: This land deals 1 damage to any target.'"

item.title: [sld] Master of the Wild Hunt
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

{T}: Tap all untapped Wolf creatures you control. Each Wolf tapped this way deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power divided as its controller chooses among any number of those Wolves.

item.title: [sld] Karrthus, Tyrant of Jund
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dragon

Flying, haste

When Karrthus, Tyrant of Jund enters the battlefield, gain control of all Dragons, then untap all Dragons.

Other Dragon creatures you control have haste.

item.title: [pewk] The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale
item.description:
Legendary Land

All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature unless you pay {1}."

item.title: [pewk] Ancestral Recall
item.description:
Instant

Target player draws three cards.

item.title: [pewk] Gaea's Cradle
item.description:
Legendary Land

{T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.

item.title: [pewk] Scrubland
item.description:
Land — Plains Swamp

({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)

item.title: [pewk] Time Walk
item.description:
Sorcery

Take an extra turn after this one.

item.title: [pewk] Bazaar of Baghdad
item.description:
Land

{T}: Draw two cards, then discard three cards.

item.title: [pneo] Reckoner Bankbuster
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

Reckoner Bankbuster enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it.

{2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Reckoner Bankbuster: Draw a card. Then if there are no charge counters on Reckoner Bankbuster, create a Treasure token and a 1/1 colorless Pilot creature token with "This creature crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater."

Crew 3

item.title: [p23] Mycosynth Lattice
item.description:
Artifact

All permanents are artifacts in addition to their other types.

All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are colorless.

Players may spend mana as though it were mana of any color.

item.title: [p23] Painter's Servant
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Scarecrow

As Painter's Servant enters the battlefield, choose a color.

All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are the chosen color in addition to their other colors.

item.title: [one] Bladed Ambassador
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Soldier

Bladed Ambassador enters the battlefield with an oil counter on it.

{1}, Remove an oil counter from Bladed Ambassador: Bladed Ambassador gains indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [one] Furnace Punisher
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Warrior

Menace

At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Furnace Punisher deals 2 damage to that player unless they control two or more basic lands.

https://www.ungeek.ph/2023/01/magic-the-gathering-phyrexia-all-will-be-one-card-preview-furnace-punisher/

item.title: [one] Rustvine Cultivator
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Elf Druid

{T}: Put an oil counter on Rustvine Cultivator.

{T}, Remove an oil counter from Rustvine Cultivator: Untap target land.

item.title: [one] Zopandrel, Hunger Dominus
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Reach

At the beginning of each combat, double the power and toughness of each creature you control until end of turn.

{G/P}{G/P}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Put an indestructible counter on Zopandrel, Hunger Dominus. ({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)

https://twitter.com/Fazendo_Nerdice/status/1618265662660677638/photo/1

item.title: [one] Red Sun's Twilight
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy up to X target artifacts. If X is 5 or more, for each artifact destroyed this way, create a token that's a copy of it. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [one] Dragonwing Glider
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

For Mirrodin! (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 red Rebel creature token, then attach this to it.)

Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and haste.

Equip {3}{R}{R}

item.description:
Land — Sphere

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

{X}, {T}: The Mycosynth Gardens becomes a copy of target nontoken artifact you control with mana value X.

item.title: [one] Tablet of Compleation
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Put an oil counter on Tablet of Compleation.

{T}: Add {C}. Activate only if Tablet of Compleation has two or more oil counters on it.

{1}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if Tablet of Compleation has five or more oil counters on it.

item.title: [one] Argentum Masticore
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Masticore

First strike, protection from multicolored

At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Argentum Masticore unless you discard a card. When you discard a card this way, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls with mana value less than or equal to the mana value of the discarded card.

item.title: [one] Unctus, Grand Metatect
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Vedalken

Other blue creatures you control have "Whenever this creature becomes tapped, draw a card, then discard a card."

Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

{U/P}: Until end of turn, target creature you control becomes a blue artifact in addition to its other colors and types. Activate only as a sorcery. ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or {2} life.)

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1717173018

item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Soldier

Bladed Ambassador enters the battlefield with an oil counter on it.

{1}, Remove an oil counter from Bladed Ambassador: Bladed Ambassador gains indestructible until end of turn.
